title: Start
body: <>It’s open! <> <>Brynn! <> <> <> <> <><>It’s so good to finally see you! <>I was starting to think you were going to stay in London forever. <>Honestly, I wish I could’ve. It was incredible! <><>The classes... the sightseeing... the food... <><> I did! I’m glad I got the chance to study abroad but... <>I also missed you all a lot. <>You guys are my best friends, you know? <><>Aww, Brynn! I missed you too! <><>Without you everyone’s kind of been doing their own thing... <><> ... but now that our DM’s here, at least we can get back to D&D! <><>Yeah! I can’t wait to see how the campaign wraps up after all these years. <>I’m so excited to see you guys finally battle Lady Malacatha! <><>I know, I can’t believe we finally cornered her! <> And all it took to get here was a teensy alliance between nations. <><>You’ll be needing that alliance! She’s pretty powerful normally, but who knows what she’ll do now that you’ve backed her into a corner? <>Hey, we’re the heroes of the Fullcrest Alliance! We can take anything she can throw at us. <><>Of course! <><>So I guess this’ll be the last session. I’m kind of sad to see it end, but at the same time I can’t wait to bring you guys a new campaign. <>I feel the same way. We’ve been playing these characters together for so long. I’m really gonna miss them. <>But then we get to create new characters, and that’s always a fun time. <><>Yeah, for sure! [[How are things with you?|HowAreThings]] [[Have any new character ideas?|HaveAnyNew]]

title: RubyOkayOkay
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyLaugh>>Alright, alright! Sounds like you had an awesome time, huh.

title: HowAreThings
body: <>So have things been? <>Everything’s been okay. Sort of... <>Only sort of? Why? <><>Uh, ‘cause... <>... ‘cause I’m taking Organic Chemistry this semester! Yeah, that class is killing me. <>Oh, I don’t want to know, do I? <>Nope. <>I tried finding a study group but... talking to people is hard. <>I’m sure everyone in your class feels that way, too. <>Yeah, maybe. <>It was just nice back in high school when we could always go to each other for help. <>Franklin helped me get through history, and I’m pretty sure you saved my AP English grade! <><>You know we’ve got your back! <><>But, if you’re having trouble, you’ve gotta make sure to ask for help, okay? <>Promise you’ll look into getting some tutoring? <>Yeah, of course. [[Rebranch1]]

title: HaveAnyNew
body: <>So have any ideas about who your next character will be? <><>Hmmm... <>I don’t know, Vel is the best character I’ve ever made so topping her is going to be pretty hard. <>Oh, oh! What if I played her twin? <>Vel has a twin? <>Well she doesn’t right now, but she could! <>Oooh! Twins who were separated at birth! <>Maybe the other one grew up somewhere else with a different family, but like Vel she discovered she had an affinity for magic, or something. <>Fair enough, but are you sure you’re not interested in trying someone else? <>Well I don’t know, I just love the way it feels to play her. <>She’s kind and caring, yet powerful. So powerful that she can keep all the people she cares about standing strong. People rely on her and look up to her. <>She is pretty incredible. Alright, you could play her twin if you wanted to. <>Thanks Brynn! I know it’s not the most original idea, though. I’ll probably check out the handbook one more time and see if I get any other bright ideas. [[Rebranch1]]

title: Rebranch1
body:
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorKnock>>
<<activateOffScreenSpeechBubble Franklin>>It’s me!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Door’s open!
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorOpenClose>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Woah, Franklin’s here already?
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDown>>
<<showCharacter Franklin true>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinIntroHey>> Hey, guys!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Wow, look who’s on time for once!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I’m so proud of you! Is this gonna be a regular thing?
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>I wouldn’t bet on it, you know how much my manager loves keeping me past clock out.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>So what happened?
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Well, I might’ve told him about this awesome friend of mine who had just come back to the states. He let me leave a little early to meet with them.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Very nice! Maybe after working for there for years, you’ve finally wormed your way into his little old heart.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>So, when do I get to meet this really cool friend of yours?
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>> <<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinLaugh>>Oh, shut up.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>It’s good to have you back, Brynn.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s good to be back!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Ahem!
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>It’s great to see you too, Ruby, as always.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<someoneInterrupting Franklin RubyItsOkayReally 2 interruptionOne>>And about not being able to meet up, I’m sorry. Scheduling these past few months has been... well—
[[Been working a lot these days?|BeenWorkingALot]]
[[Ready to jump back in?|ReadyToJump]]

title: RubyItsOkayReally
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruptionOne>><<overridePose Ruby happy>>It’s okay! Really, don’t worry about it.

title: ReadyToJump
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Need any help getting back up to speed?
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinThinking>>I think I’ve got it. I had a few minutes to look over my character sheet yesterday.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Barbarians can’t rage when wearing heavy armor, right?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Correct.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>>Cool, got it. Been looking forward to being the big damage-dealer again.
[[Rebranch2]]

title: BeenWorkingALot
body: <>Is your schedule still the same? <><>Yep, unfortunately. <>I mean, school and work are fine on their own, but, like, the both of them together? <>You know what I mean. <>I get it. Just don’t push yourself too hard. <>Yeah, take breaks so we can actually see you! <><>That’s why I’m here. To sit back, relax, and roll crits on some monsters. [[Rebranch2]]

title: Rebranch2
body: <>So what about you, Brynn? How are you? <>Oh, I’m good! Even better now that I’m back here with you guys. <>Let me tell you, going cold turkey on RPG’s after playing once a week for two years? <>Not fun. <>No kidding! How do you think we felt? <>Yeah, and at the very least you know what’s coming next. Us? You left us right as we got to Lady Malacatha’s castle last session! Lady Malacatha. <>Seriously! Do you know how horrible this wait has been Brynn?! <>There are laws against torturing people like that! You should’ve been charged with war crimes! <><><>War crimes... <><>I’m sorry, I’m sorry! I had to catch my flight! <>Uh huh, likely story. But no excuses this time! Today’s the day we finally end Malacatha’s tyrannical reign, right, Franklin? <>Damn right! Assuming everything goes smoothly, anyway. <><><>And, uh, speaking of things going smoothly, are those two still...? <><><><>Oh... um... yeah. At least... if anything’s changed, I haven’t heard. <><>Heard about what, exactly? <>The Allison and Lance mess. <>The... what? <>Frank, she just got back. <>Oh, duh, of course you wouldn’t know. <>Well, where do I begin... <>Do you remember that musical they were trying to produce together? <>Yeah. Are they still looking for playhouses where they can to show it? <>Wait a sec. I mean, maybe we don’t have to get into this right now. What if they show up and they’re fine? It has been a while since— [[LanceAllisonArrival]]

title: LanceAllisonArrival
body: <> <><>What part of “we’re not talking about this today” didn’t you get? Can you just shut up? <><><> I would if you’d listen to me for five seconds; I’m just trying to get you to understand me here. Can you at least— <><>Nevermind... <>That’s...? <><>*sigh* Allison and Lance? Yup. <>Sorry Brynn, I should’ve warned you about this but I... didn’t really know how to bring it up. <>Jesus, Allison, why are you still so hung up over this? I’ve already told you— <><>Me?! I’m not hung up about anything! You’re the one who keeps bringing it— <>Well, maybe you should’ve thought about that before you made me look like a complete dumbass! <>So this has been a thing? <>For the past few months, yeah. <>Every time I’ve gotten them together it ends up with them arguing over that show... <>It just never ends. <>WHAT? What fantasy world are you living in where you think I’m the selfish one here? <>REALITY. <> <> <><> HEY. GUYS. THE DOOR’S OPEN. <> <><>... <> <> <> <>... <> <> <>So... how much of that did you guys hear? <>Enough. <><>...Sorry about that. <><>Yeah, sorry... <><><>It’s really good to see you Brynn. How’s my girl been? <><>I’m good but... um— <><> Would it kill you to message someone back the same day? <>Sorry I... I was just so busy I’d forget every now and then. <>Well, no use sweating about it. Hardly matters when you’re finally back with us! <>It’s absolutely astounding to see you again Brynn! <> <><>And Ruby and Franklin as well! It’s been some time since we’ve all hung out, huh? <>Uh, yeah! <>I hope things have been going well! Err, I mean, I hope that things have been... uh... <>Things’ve been fine. Actually, they’ve been pretty great. [[Getting any work?|GettingAnyWork]] [[Ready to jump back into D&D?|ReadyToJumpTwo]]

title: AllisonSureFine
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>>SURE. FINE. There, are you happy now? Can we finally stop talking about it?

title: LanceAwkwardSilence
body:
<<activateOffScreenSimultaneousSpeechBubble Lance speakerTwo>>...
<<activateSimultaneousSpeechBubble Lance speakerTwo>>...

title: LanceCauseYouWont
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>>Cause you won’t fucking talk to me without being a passive aggressive nightmare!

title: AllisonBoyAmI
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonPositive>>Boy am I glad to hear that! You had us pretty worried at times honestly.

title: GettingAnyWork
body: <>So... how have you both been? Getting any work? <><>Ooh, I never told you guys! I’ve been scoring guitar gigs! <><>Oh, really?! That’s great to hear! <><> Thanks! I’m totally stoked. I’m finally making money after all that effort. <>And Lance, I heard that you’re in a show in the playhouse downtown. <><>That I am! I’m in a production of Fiddler on the Roof. <><>I mean it’s not on Broadway or anything, but y’know, still pretty cool. <>That’s so cool! For both of you. <>For sure! But, uh... if you don’t mind my asking, what about your musical? Is that going okay? [[Rebranch3]]

title: ReadyToJumpTwo
body: <>So, you both ready for the big finale? <><>Oh, yeah! <><>Definitely. <>It’s been far too long since I was... <><>Arannis Shadowfall. Dashing gentleman, masterful rogue, and sworn enemy of injustice. <> <><>Yep, classic. <><>Good to see you as always, Arannis. <><>Good to be seen! <> <>Allison, think you’re ready for all the encounters in the castle? <><>I mean, as ready as I can be! <><>But yeah, we can beat any of the traps that get thrown our way, as long as we don’t do anything stupid. <><>What’s that supposed to mean? <>Uh, it didn’t mean anything. Just don’t be chaotic-stupid, or whatever. <>Yeah, I know when someone’s trying to call me out. <><><>Jesus, are you that insecure—? [[Rebranch3]]

title: Rebranch3
body: <> <> <>Um, well... <>Right, so, here’s the deal. The show’s kind of... <>We sort of decided that we were going to... <>Put it on hiatus. <>...Yeah, exactly. <>I’m sorry to hear that. I know it meant a lot to you, Allison. <>It’s fine. I’m over it. Besides, we just couldn’t seem to work well together. <>Yeah, you know how it is. Some people just get so invested in a project that if any little thing goes wrong suddenly it’s the end of the world. <><>I mean, when someone else misses a ton of rehearsals and an absolutely critical meeting with playhouse owners— <>Okay! I’m sorry, we don’t have to keep talking about it. I didn’t mean to make things awkward. <>No it’s... it’s okay. We’re fine. <>How about we just try playing some D&D? We won’t have to worry about anything else that’s going on, just relax and have fun for a bit. <><>We’ve come a long way. It would be shame to just let Lady Malacatha’s plans come to fruition, right? <>Yeah, you’re right. I’ve missed this too much. <>True enough. <><><><>Fear not, everyone. Arannis Shadowfall is at your side! <> <>Okay, everyone ready? <><>Yeah, let’s do it! <><>Yes! <><>You bet. <><><>Onward to victory! <> [[IntroSpeech]]

title: BrynnOkayOkay
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Brynn interruptionOne>>Okay, okay! What’s wrong you two? What happened with the musical?

title: LanceHeyIWasHonest
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Lance interruptionOne>><<overridePose Lance irritated>>Hey! I was honest about my other commitments. I can’t put my life on pause just for one little—

title: IntroSpeech
body:
<<fadeOutSound CuedMusicStings>>
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<overridePose Allison neutral>>
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<overridePose Ruby neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Alright, then.
<<triggerSound CuedMusicStings musicTrackTwo>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>When last we saw our heroes, the great adventurers of lore, they were continuing their quest to defeat Lady Malacatha and end her reign of tyranny.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The heroes had been fighting her for a long time. They’d met many friends along the way, some of them brave warriors, some of them ordinary townsfolk...
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>>Like Garth, the tavern owner.
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>>Oh my God, do you think he’s still angry at us?
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Hey, it’s not our fault he didn’t have fire insurance for his tavern.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I’m still really sorry about that!
<<overridePose Franklin neutral>>
<<overridePose Lance neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>And now, inspired by the heroes, these friends and comrades have begun an assault on Lady Malacatha’s castle.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>If all goes well, the group will finally complete the mission they’ve had for so long.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Alright, so we’d snuck up next to the castle, right? What’s the area look like again, Brynn?
[[Rocky, and covered in sand.|RockySandy]]
[[Cracked by lava fissures.|Lava]]
[[Covered in snow.|Snow]]

title: RockySandy
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There are huge points of obsidian rock coming out of the pale desert ground surrounding her glooming, gothic castle. 
It should give you adequate cover with which to approach.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Solid, good to know.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The dune on which you’re standing gives you a good view of the battle below. 
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a vast desert plain about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Lava
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Her castle is surrounded by lava flows from the foot of the nearby volcano...
... the glow from which highlights the castle’s glooming, gothic silhouette.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>Oooh, super-ominous. Love it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The rocky hill on which you’re standing gives you a good view of the battle below. 
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a vast rocky plain about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Snow
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Underneath a stormy sky, the entire landscape is covered in snow and ice. A billowing storm is sending more snow down upon you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>>I have to say, Brynn. As far as locations for final showdowns go, this is pretty unique.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn happy>>Thanks!
<<overridePose Brynn neutral>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There’s snow in the air, but you can still see the battle in the clearing below.
The Fullcrest Alliance is fighting Malacatha’s forces in a tundra expanse about a mile away.
[[Rebranch4]]

title: Rebranch4
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>As far as you can tell, Malacatha’s forces haven’t noticed that you’ve split away from the Alliance.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>Brilliant. We have the element of surprise.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonCharacter>>Yes, it seems the plan’s worked perfectly. Perhaps you should have had more faith in me, Arannis.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yes, yes, Tiana, you and your plans.
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Whine if you like. Gundren, are you ready for battle?
<<changeFont Allison outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Jumping in just like that, huh? Alright, let me see if I can find the voice...
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<changeFont Franklin inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinCharacter>>The sooner we reach Malacatha and slay her, the better. Let’s move.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>I couldn’t agree more! Have your Teleportation spell handy, Vel?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyCharacter>>Why of course, Arannis! 
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Where should I teleport us again? The throne room?
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Precisely! Preferably right on top of Malacatha’s miserable face, if you would.
<<changeFont Ruby outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Alright, I cast Teleport!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Okay, okay, so as you begin casting Teleport, I’m going to need you to make a Wisdom check.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>A Wisdom check? That’s... new. Okay um...
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>18.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>18? Sorry, but you feel the influence of something emanating from the castle. Some dark and twisted presence clouds your mind.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Uh-oh... What happens?
[[Your spell is blocked.|SpellIsBlocked]]
[[You take damage.|YouTakeDamage]]

title: SpellIsBlocked
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You recover, and realize that your spell isn’t working.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Clearly, Lady Malacatha didn’t want anyone to be able to reach her so easily.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<changeFont Ruby inCharacter>>Everyone, something’s not right. My spell won’t work.
[[MajorChoice1]]

title: YouTakeDamage
body: <>From the shock of the sudden pain, you drop the spell aaand... <>[Dice Rolling] ...take 36 points of psychic damage! You stumble to the ground, your head pounding from whatever just happened. <>36? Oh my God! <><>Vel? Vel, what’s wrong? <>Ow...it’s nothing. I’m okay. <>Something stopped me from teleporting us in. This must be Malacatha’s doing. [[MajorChoice1]]

title: MajorChoice1
body: <> <>Anyway, Vel, you can discern that this anti-magic field seems to emanate from the castle itself. You doubt you’ll be able to teleport within its walls. <>Oh, yikes. I do so, then report all of this to the party. <><>Well, that complicates things. Vel, do you think you could try again? <> <><>I don’t know, I don’t think so. I’d probably need to roll at least a 19 to— <>Damn. So we can’t teleport in, and we probably can’t smash our way in, either. <> <> Hardly a problem when Arannis Shadowfall is at your side! Stand back, everyone. <> <><><>Oh, God... <><>Alright, so I stretch my arms and jog in place for a moment, then beeline towards the castle wall— <><>Wh—? *Sigh* <> <><><><>Arannis, what are you doing? <>Why, no less than saving the mission, Tiana. You know how agile I am. I can vault up the side of the wall and then tie a rope for you all to climb up. <>It’s the enemy’s fortress! There could be undead guards up there; they’d attack you immediately. <><>They’d try. <> <>And then Arannis winks, and cracks his knuckles. <>For the love of... <><>No. That could completely ruin our chances of getting in undetected. Don’t be an idiot, Arannis. <><><>Look here Tiana, I realize that ever since you got us out of that snake pit you’ve fancied yourself as some great tactician... <> ...but right now my skills are all you need. Aren’t I right, everyone? <>Oh, your “skills”? The ones that got us trapped in that snake pit in the first place? I don’t think so. We have to work as a team. <>Well, what do you propose, then, oh wise-and-noble leader? <><><>Uh... Arannis? Tiana? I’m sure we’ll all be happy to get inside regardless of what approach we take. <>Agreed. Are we getting in the castle, or not? <>We will, once Arannis decides to stand down and we find a more intelligent way to proceed. <>This is a fortified castle! What other way could there possibly be to get in? <> [[(Add more details to the castle)|AddDetails]] [[(Nudge them forward)|NudgeThemForward]]

title: RubyErrIMean
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Ruby interruption>><<changeFont Ruby inCharacter>><<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyUh>>Err... I mean, her anti-magic is probably too strong for my spells to overcome!

title: AllisonYeeeahNo
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>>Yeeeah, no. Brynn, I stop him. I block his path.

title: AddDetails
body: <> <> <> <>*Ahem!* I should point out that there are a few noteworthy elements of the castle, if they’re relevant to whatever you decide. There a few high windows here and there along its outer wall, most of which are covered by metal bars. Also... <>... Every now and again you can see a skeleton archer or two walk across the top of the wall. <>Finally, you notice a vast column of undead warriors pouring out from the main gates on the other side of the castle towards the nearby battle. <><><>Even with those skeleton archers, I could easily— <><>Alright, Arannis, you want a better idea? How about this, everyone. <>I’ll use Seeming to disguise us all as undead, and we’ll all sneak in through the front gate. <>There’s a smaller chance of us being spotted, and we don’t have to depend the entirety of the mission on our Rogue’s luckiness. <>What? That’s such a roundabout approach! My way is simpler. <> <>Actually... I like Tiana’s plan. With so many undead marching out the front, they wouldn’t notice a few extra of their number going back inside. <><>Exactly! <>Hm, that sounds fine to me. <>Then we’re agreed! Sorry, you’re outvoted, Arannis. <><>But my way works all the time! You’ve never had a problem with it before! <>The stakes are too high this time. We absolutely cannot be detected before reaching Malacatha. <>Sorry, Arannis, but you can show off some other time, okay? <> <>...Sure. Whatever. I go along with it. <> <>I discreetly make my way around to the front of the castle. Everyone coming? <>Yep! <>Sure. <>...Yeah. <>Alright. You make your way around to the front of the castle. Malacatha’s army is there, as you saw previously. There are skeletons emerging from the castle, in a long, clattering column, alongside various undead. <>Alright, folks, I cast Seeming on everyone, making us all look like... let’s say zombies. Then we move inside. <>Oh, and we should shamble. Like zombies. <>Sounds good. There’s space for you to enter on either side of the column, and the undead aren’t intelligent enough to perceive you entering. Eventually all the real undead exit and you’re safely alone, for the time being. <><><>Not bad. <><><>Yeah, that worked like a charm! <><><> Nothing to it. <>Yeah. I mean, my way would’ve worked fine, but if everyone prefers to let Allison tell them what to do, then sure. <><>Lance—! <>...Forget it. Let’s just keep going. <><>Brynn, we’re inside the castle. What now? [[MajorChoice2]]

title: NudgeThemForward
body: <> <> <> <>Try not to take too long to decide. This is only the first encounter, you know. <>Yeah, seriously... <><>Enough of this! I’m going up the wall. <><><>You are not! <><><>If Arannis can do it, he should. We can’t kill Malacatha until we get inside. <><><Gundren, you know him. If he keeps this up— <><>Can you two just...? Nevermind. <><><>If it gets us in faster, I support Arannis’ plan. <><>I do, too...I guess. <> <>I mean, we should get going... <>No, no. It’s fine... <>So you step out of the way? <>Sure <> <>Great. I run at the wall and parkour up the side. <>Okay, give me an acrobatics check. <> <>Plus all bonuses, that’s a 25. <>Alright, you for sure make it up that wall. Do you want to add any flourishes? <><>Absolutely. <>I grab outcroppings and protruding bricks and things, and do little flips to leap between them. <>When I get to the top, I cartwheel up the ledge, take out two knives and throw them into one guard each. <>I never said there were guards. <>You never needed to. <>Well, as it happens, there is a pair skeletons up there. Given your dexterity, I’ll let you have the first attack. <>Nice. <> <><>Aaand, that’s a crit! <>Oof! Honestly, for these guards we can skip the damage roll and assume you take them out, given that it was a surprise attack. <><>What’s wrong, my sorry, undead friends? Is Arannis’ speed too much for you? <><>Get on with it, Arannis! <> <><>Okay, chill. <><>Anyway, I tie a rope onto one of the crenellations and let it down for everyone to climb up on. <><>Were my skills to your satisfaction, Tiana? <> <>Whatever. Let’s just get inside. <>Once you’ve all climbed up, you find a trapdoor into the castle on the wall. [[MajorChoice2]]

title: AllisonOhShitWait
body: <<activateInterruptingSpeechBubble Allison interruptionOne>><<changeFont Allison outOfCharacter>><<overridePose Allison neutral>>Oh, shit. Wait a sec...

title: LanceOhYouKnow
body: <><>Oh, you know me. I see, I see...

title: MajorChoice2
body: Empty Text
